name: Gas Guzzler
description:
This was made at a time of quickly rising gas prices. I was asked to create a simple game for a marketing landing page that would give tips on getting better fuel economy.

Yes, this does look a lot like another one of my games, Potholes: The Video Game. I decided to use the color palette on this game. 

Made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Works on mobile as well.
